verses.verse: He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> It was <S%H7251>square.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> its <S%H7161>horns<s%> on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6438>corners.<s%> Its <S%H7161>horns<s%> were of one piece with <S%H6823>it,<s%> and he overlaid it with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> the <S%H5518>pots,<s%> the <S%H3257>shovels,<s%> the <S%H4219>basins,<s%> the <S%H4207>forks,<s%> and the fire <S%H4289>pans.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> all its <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> a <S%H4345>grating<s%> of a <S%H7568>network<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> under the ledge <S%H3749>around<s%> it <S%H4295>beneath,<s%> reaching halfway <S%H2677>up.<s%>
He <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7099>ends<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H4345>grating,<s%> to be <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>poles.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

He <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> with which to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H6213>it.<s%> He made it <S%H5014>hollow<s%> with <S%H3871>planks.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> and its <S%H3653>base<s%> of <S%H5178>brass,<s%> out of the <S%H4759>mirrors<s%> of the <S%H6633>ministering<s%> women who <S%H6633>ministered<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H2691>court:<s%> for the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H8486>southward<s%> the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> were of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%>

their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> were of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

For the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6242>twenty,<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets,<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

For the <S%H3220>west<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> were <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H6235>ten,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H6235>ten;<s%> the <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets,<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
For the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6285>side<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>
The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> for the one <S%H3802>side<s%> were <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three;<s%>

and so for the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H3802>side:<s%> on this hand and that hand by the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> were <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of <S%H2568>fifteen<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> <S%H7969>three,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>
All the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court<s%> were of fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

The <S%H134>sockets<s%> for the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass.<s%> The <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets<s%> were of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and the <S%H6826>overlaying<s%> of their <S%H7218>capitals,<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and all the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> were <S%H2836>filleted<s%> with <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

The <S%H4539>screen<s%> for the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%> was the work of the <S%H7551>embroiderer,<s%> of <S%H8504>blue,<s%> <S%H713>purple,<s%> <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and fine <S%H7806>twined<s%> <S%H8336>linen.<s%> <S%H6242>Twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length,<s%> and the <S%H6967>height<s%> in the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5980>like<s%> to the <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court.<s%>

Their <S%H5982>pillars<s%> were <S%H702>four,<s%> and their <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H702>four,<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> their <S%H2053>hooks<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H6826>overlaying<s%> of their <S%H7218>capitals,<s%> and their <S%H2838>fillets,<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>
All the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court,<s%> were of <S%H5178>brass.<s%>

<S%H428>This<s%> is the <S%H6485>amount<s%> of material used for the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> even the <S%H4908>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> as they were <S%H6485>counted,<s%> according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

<S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> all that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

With him was <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan,<s%> an <S%H2796>engraver,<s%> and a skillful <S%H2803>workman,<s%> and an <S%H7551>embroiderer<s%> in <S%H8504>blue,<s%> in <S%H713>purple,<s%> in <S%H8144>scarlet,<s%> and in fine <S%H8336>linen.<s%>

All the <S%H2091>gold<s%> that was <S%H6213>used<s%> for the <S%H4399>work<s%> in all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> even the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of the <S%H8573>offering,<s%> was <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

The <S%H3701>silver<s%> of those who were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> was one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> seventy <S%H7657>five<s%> <S%H8255>shekels,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary:<s%>

a <S%H1235>beka<s%> a <S%H1538>head,<s%> that <S%H4276>is,<s%> half a <S%H8255>shekel,<s%> after the <S%H8255>shekel<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> for everyone who <S%H5674>passed<s%> over to those who were <S%H6485>numbered,<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>upward,<s%> for <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> fifty <S%H2572>men.<s%>

The one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> were for <S%H3332>casting<s%> the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary,<s%> and the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil;<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H134>sockets<s%> for the one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> a <S%H3603>talent<s%> for a <S%H134>socket.<s%>

Of the one <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> shekels he <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H2053>hooks<s%> for the <S%H5982>pillars,<s%> <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> their <S%H7218>capitals,<s%> and made fillets for <S%H2836>them.<s%>
The <S%H5178>brass<s%> of the <S%H8573>offering<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H3603>talents,<s%> and two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels.<s%>

With this he <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H134>sockets<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4196>altar,<s%> the <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H4345>grating<s%> for <S%H3627>it,<s%> all the vessels of the <S%H4196>altar,<s%>

the <S%H134>sockets<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court,<s%> the <S%H134>sockets<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H2691>court,<s%> all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> and all the <S%H3489>pins<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> the <S%H2691>court.<s%>
